text: Kriet jih keu gata sapeue han jijok Meunyo prang ka troh sit yo jih leupah Takalon jingieng u ateuh gata Meuputa-puta matajih basah sang-sang ka pingsan jih keumeung mate Meunyo prang tan le laen jipeugah Lidah jih tajam jikheun keu gata Bandum buet gata sit jikheun salah Meunyo bak buet got di jih kriet that-that t Peue nyang tapakat hana jipapah Awaknyan bandum han jimeuiman Neubri hukoman treuk jih le Allah Amai jih bandum Neupeubinasa Bak Tuhan teumaÊ»buet nyan that mudah
